Hi, I am Jordan Revol. 

I am currently a PhD student at KU Leuven in Belgium.
My research lie in the development and the application of both statistical and data science tools for the research in psychology, focusing on Intensive Longitudinal designs. 

### Keywords

Sample size planning, predictive accuracy, data quality, intensive longitudinal studies, data science
